name: zseries-poc-application
description: A sample zOS Application - IBM DevOps Acceleration Team

componentTemplate.name: MVSCOMPONENT
componentTemplate.description: Template component which stores and deploys z/OS data set artifacts

envPropDefs.name: deploy.env.pds.mapping
envPropDefs.label: deploy.env.pds.mapping
envPropDefs.description: Specify the PDS packaged, and where to deploy them in the mapping table. Each line is a mapping rule with the format of From PDS,To PDS. * can be used in From PDS to match any characters. When multiple rules have the same From PDS, only the first one is used. The value can be overrode by property with higher order of precedence, for example, Agent property or Resource property.

envPropDefs.name: deploy.env.hfs.targetdir
envPropDefs.label: deploy.env.hfs.targetdir
envPropDefs.description: Specify a target directory to deploy HFS files

envPropDefs.name: jes.host
envPropDefs.label: jes.host
envPropDefs.description: Hostname of Job server. Use localhost unless you have a specific requirement to submit job to another z/OS.

envPropDefs.name: jes.user
envPropDefs.label: jes.user
envPropDefs.description: Userid to logon to JES subsystem.

envPropDefs.name: jes.password
envPropDefs.label: jes.password
envPropDefs.description: Password to logon to JES subsystem.

envPropDefs.name: jes.monitor.port
envPropDefs.label: jes.monitor.port
envPropDefs.description: JES job monitor port (1-65535). Default is 6715.

propDefs.name: ucd.repository.host
propDefs.label: ucd.repository.host
propDefs.description: Hostname of the FTP server where you get version artifacts. Required to use FTP Artifacts step.

propDefs.name: ucd.repository.location
propDefs.label: ucd.repository.location
propDefs.description: The location of the repository where the z/OS deploy toolkit stores artifacts. Required to use Copy Artifacts or FTP Artifacts steps.

propDefs.name: ucd.repository.user
propDefs.label: ucd.repository.user
propDefs.description: FTP username. Required to use FTP Artifacts step.

propDefs.name: ucd.repository.password
propDefs.label: ucd.repository.password
propDefs.description: FTP password. Required to use FTP Artifacts step.

processes.name: Remove all versions
processes.description: Remove all versions in an environment including the backup created during version deployment. Use this process when you want to start next round of development with a clean environment.  Audit history is available even if versions have been removed from the environment.

processes.name: Remove redundant versions
processes.description: Remove redundant versions in an environment. Redundant versions are these versions which are replaced completely by later deployed versions.
